cerentEnvMonMIB.name: cerentEnvMonMIB
cerentEnvMonMIB.contactinfo: Support@Cisco.com Postal: 1435 North McDowell Blvd Petaluma CA 94954 Tel: +1.877.323.7368
cerentEnvMonMIB.description: This MIB module provides Environmental status information

cerentEnvMonMibConformance.name: cerentEnvMonMibConformance
cerentEnvMonMibConformance.description: This node is created for compliance. Has objects as required by the RFCs

cerentEnvMonMibCompliance.name: cerentEnvMonMibCompliance
cerentEnvMonMibCompliance.description: The compliance statements for Cisco ONS devices.

cerentEnvMonMibGroups.name: cerentEnvMonMibGroups
cerentEnvMonMibGroups.description: All the objects and events are grouped under this for conformance

cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsTable.name: cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsTable
cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsTable.description: This table maintains the status info for all EnvMon related voltages picked up by the sensors in the device.

cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsEntry.name: cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsEntry
cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsEntry.description: There will as many rows as there are sensors in the device.

cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsIndex.name: cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsIndex
cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsIndex.description: The value index uniquely indicates the voltage sensor in the device.

cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsDescr.name: cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsDescr
cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsDescr.description: Unique Name/Description of the voltage sensor.

cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsCurrentValue.name: cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsCurrentValue
cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsCurrentValue.description: Current voltage measurement at this voltage sensor.

cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsThresholdVeryHig.name: cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsThresholdVeryHigh
cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsThresholdVeryHig.description: If the current voltage value exceeds this threshold value, an alarm event will be raised by the device. The severity of this event may be provisionable.

cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsThresholdHigh.name: cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsThresholdHigh
cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsThresholdHigh.description: If the current voltage value exceeds this threshold value, a warning event will be raised by the device. The severity of this event may be provisionable.

cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsThresholdLow.name: cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsThresholdLow
cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsThresholdLow.description: If the current voltage value falls below this threshold value, a warning event will be raised by the device. The severity of this event may be provisionable.

cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsThresholdVeryLow.name: cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsThresholdVeryLow
cerentEnvMonVoltageStatsThresholdVeryLow.description: If the current voltage value falls below this threshold value, an alarm event will be raised by the device. The severity of this event may be provisionable.

cerentEnvMonTemperatureStatsTable.name: cerentEnvMonTemperatureStatsTable
cerentEnvMonTemperatureStatsTable.description: This table provides ambient temperature information as measured by the temperature sensors.

cerentEnvMonTemperatureStatsEntry.name: cerentEnvMonTemperatureStatsEntry
cerentEnvMonTemperatureStatsEntry.description: Each temperature is represented by a row in the table.

cerentEnvMonTemperatureStatsIndex.name: cerentEnvMonTemperatureStatsIndex
cerentEnvMonTemperatureStatsIndex.description: The value index uniquely indicates the temperature sensor in the device.

cerentEnvMonTemperatureStatsDescr.name: cerentEnvMonTemperatureStatsDescr
cerentEnvMonTemperatureStatsDescr.description: Unique Name/Description of the temperature sensor.

cerentEnvMonTemperatureStatsCurrentValue.name: cerentEnvMonTemperatureStatsCurrentValue
cerentEnvMonTemperatureStatsCurrentValue.description: Current Temperature measurement at this temperature sensor.

cerentEnvMonTemperatureStatsThresholdHig.name: cerentEnvMonTemperatureStatsThresholdHigh
cerentEnvMonTemperatureStatsThresholdHig.description: If the current temperature value exceeds this threshold value, an alarm event will be raised by the device. The severity of this event may be provisionable.

cerentEnvMonMibBasicCompliance.name: cerentEnvMonMibBasicCompliance
cerentEnvMonMibBasicCompliance.description: The basic implementation requirements for all Cisco ONS network devices.
